title: "Lifespan of S1928A v WT"
author: "Kyle Ireton"
date: "01/13/23"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
library(lme4)

```


```{r}

rockit <- read_csv("C:/Users/kylei/Documents/Github/Learning_paper/lifespan.csv") %>% 
  
  select(Cage, ID, Sex, GT, DOB, End, Days, Weeks) 

rockcheck = rockit %>% 
  
  transmute(ID = paste(Cage, ID, sep = "-"),
            
            Sex,
            
            GT, 
            
            Days)

rockcheck$ID = as.factor(rockcheck$ID)

rockcheck$GT = factor(rockcheck$GT,
                      levels = c("W", "K"))

```

```{r, fig.width = 5, fig.height=6}

ggplot(
  
  rockcheck,
  
  aes(
    
    GT,
    
    Days,
    
    color = GT
    
  )) +
    
  
    
  stat_summary(fun = "mean",
                 
                 geom = "point",
                 
                 size = 2) +
  
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se",
               
               geom = "errorbar",
               
               width = 0.15,
               
               size = 1) +
  
  geom_jitter(alpha = 0.5,
              
              width = 0.07,
                
                height = 10) +
  
  scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "red")) +
  
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1000)) +
  
  theme_classic()

```


```{r}

t.test(Days ~ GT,
       
       rockcheck)

```

```{r, fig.width = 5, fig.height=6}

ggplot(
  
  rockcheck,
  
  aes(
    
    interaction(GT, Sex),
    
    Days,
    
    color = GT
    
  )) +
    
  
    
  stat_summary(fun = "mean",
                 
                 geom = "point",
                 
                 size = 2) +
  
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se",
               
               geom = "errorbar",
               
               width = 0.15,
               
               size = 1) +
  
  geom_jitter(alpha = 0.5,
              
              width = 0.07,
                
                height = 10) +
  
  scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "red")) +
  
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1000)) +
  
  theme_classic()

```

little note here    

```{r}

aov(Days ~ (GT*Sex) + Error(ID), rockcheck)

```

```{r}

summary(aov(Days ~ GT*Sex + Error(ID), rockcheck))

```


```{r}
checkit <- aov(Days ~ GT*Sex + Error(ID), rockcheck)

summary(checkit)
```


```{r}

 lmer(Days ~ GT + (1|ID),
      
      rockcheck)
  
```
